DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will do a trial in two general practices to see if the introduction of a blood pressure clinic staffed by a specialist nurse supported by visiting consultant improves blood pressure control compared to usual care.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of a Nurse Led Hypertension Clinic in Inner City General Practices
DOC.criteria: Patients with last recorded blood pressure greater or equal to the British Hypertension Society audit standard Secondary hypertension Housebound NonEnglish speaking Another major illness likely to dominate pattern of care e.g. advanced cancer, dementia
DOC.keyword: Hypertension, clinical trial, nurse-led clinic, primary care
